name: Heist-off
description:
There's nothing more annoying than doing a bank heist and discovering you are not the only one who thought of that. Compete against your opponent to get as much treasure from the bank vault as you can.

Made originally for the Trijam 64 game jam within 3 hours.

Values:

  • Chest  - 7500
  • Gold Bars  - 2500
  • Large coin pile  - 2000
  • Golden cup- 1500
  • Medium coin pile - 800
  • Small coin pile- 500
  • Few coins- 250
  • Coin- 150
